title: Pedagogical Engineering Integration Program for Epistemic Knowledge Formation in Statistics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Concepts and Fundamental Understanding of Secondary Education Curriculum
context.additional_context: Customized program deepening epistemological understanding of statistics education for pre- and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners acquire the competency to design statistics education utilizing TDS (Theory of Didactical Situations) and the four stages of the SECI model (Socialization, Externalization, Combination, Internalization).
Learners systematically experience the progression from tacit insights to justified explicit understanding of statistical concepts through project-based activities.
Learners design and implement personalized statistics education strategies based on learner types derived from cluster analysis results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
